---
title: "Contact Us"
---

```{=html}
<div id="contact">
  <div id="contact-form">
    <form action="https://formspree.io/f/xdorypgo" method="POST">
      <input type="hidden" name="_subject" value="Contact request from ISRE website" />
      <br>
      <br>
      <input type="text" name="_name" placeholder="Your name" required>
      <br>
      <br>
      <input type="email" name="_replyto" placeholder="Your email" required>
      <br>
      <br>
      <textarea name="message" placeholder="Type your message" required rows="4" cols="50"></textarea>
      <br>
      <br>
    <button type="submit">Send</button>
    </form>
  </div>
</div>
```
